emails.title: Requesting Information (Course Details)
emails.content:
Opening

Dear Sir or Madam,

I hope you are well.

Main Details

I am writing to request some information about the English course advertised on your website.

Action / Request

Could you please confirm the start date, the weekly schedule, and whether the course includes an end-of-course certificate?

I would also appreciate it if you could share the total cost and any available payment options.

Closing

Thank you for your time and assistance.

Yours faithfully,
[Your Name]
